website_summaries.verdict: When it's time to hit the books, this mini desk chair provides all the features necessary to boost productivity. Great for homework or studying.
pros: Suitable for extended use from the age of 3 and up
Sturdy frame holds up to 200 pounds
Features adjustable height, 360-degree rotation, and caster wheels
Ergonomic mesh backrest is comfortable and breathable
cons: Kids may require some assistance when lowering the height

customer_reviews.title: Great pops of color for a shared girls' study!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were super quick and easy to assemble, and the quality seems great for the price! So far, very happy with them, but just finished the room, so will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: HJD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 8yo daughter and her new big kid room. She loves the color and the size is perfect. Not too big it takes up space but big enough she can use it for a few years. She says it’s very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: rcmommy06

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute chair. My 5 year old was able to put it together with my help in 3 minutes. The directions are simple & clear. You don’t really need them though. The color is really pretty. It goes up/down for the right height at the desk. The chair is meant for a child, but I fit comfortably on it as well. I’m 5’5 & 125lbs. The mesh seat easily marks though so watch your little one’s sweat hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Merrill

customer_reviews.title: This chair is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect!!!!!! Just the right size for an 8 year old with room to grow. The blue color is bright. The seat is mesh to provide air flow ( good for Florida) its sturdy, good quality. It took little effort to assemble and the directions were clear. Most importantly it came in perfect condition and packed appropriately. No damage!!!!! Yes!!!!! I would highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect- So simple and So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What a cute chair! Took 7 minutes to put together, no tools needed- anyone could figure it out, even if you don’t have instructions. The instructions are very easy to understand though. Pictures. Super simple. And it is quite comfortable I must add. The pack lumber support is in the PERFECT place for my back. The only bad thing is that now I don’t have an excuse to not do schoolwork 😉 haha. I got the turquoise one- gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Compact, small footprint; cute and sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for the small desk in my child’s room. I needed to find something compact with a small footprint to fit this area and not occlude the narrow walkway between desk and bed. It fits perfectly. I also like the low back on the chair. It is comfortable for an adult and provides even more support for a child. As a fan of purple, the color works great for us in this room as well. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Michelle Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great chair love the color, goes perfect with my furniture
customer_reviews.author: desiree johnson

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Bought it for my teenager
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Bought it for my teenager. Bottom was more of a forest green color and the top was more of a aqua/teal color. Was perfect for her room .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Color is pretty. I spot clean the seat but overall is a nice chair!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 year old; so far she is enjoying it. It was quite hard to put it together, since the holes for the back rest would not align properly, but it took just a bit of patience. The rest of the build was easy Looks sturdy; and I just wish it has armrests; but it is nice and usable
customer_reviews.author: CFTop Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROOMY CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews worried me that it may be too small. It is not at all. My 7 year old fits nicely with lots of room to grow. She can raise the height herself but isn't heavy enough to get the chair to go down, but that's fine. It does show greasy fingerprints but they wash off easily. I also sprayed it with a Scotchguard-like product, which removes some of the risk of it getting dirty fast. The chair seat also spins around in addition to rolling nicely on a wood floor and mat. No worries of scratching the floor. I'm glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ani Lyla H-D

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. I got the turquoise. Just to let anyone know that it's a deep teal blue but very pretty! It went together pretty easily. I weigh 160 lbs & I don't have any issues worrying that it's not strong enough to hold me. It glides smoothly & I like how it's not bulky for an office chair & its very comfortable. I'm going to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Pezmom

customer_reviews.title: Easily put together
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together. My daughter did it by herself following the instructions and she's eight. She loves the chair and is very proud of herself. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: CRubio

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new sewing chair that ridnt have arms so I could wiggle around while I sew. This chair does exactly that. Easy to put together, and quite comfortable to sit in for hours. The only down side is that the seat itself is a little small, but for the price, you can't argue!
customer_reviews.author: Kalli

customer_reviews.title: Add a pop of color to your office/room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. The color is her favorite and it looks just as pictured. The seat and support are comfortable and adjusting the chair is easy. Comes disassembled but assembly is easy and fast. The only thing we noticed was that the seat had stains that looked like oil which took away from the overall cosmetic look of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair for a child
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Bought it for my 8 year old .. she’s loves it as well. Very easy to put together .
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great kids' chair!
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair. It's for our 8 year old and so far it's been great. We've had it about 3 months now. The turquoise color is beautiful. We had no trouble putting it together. It has a low-back design, but that doesn't seem to bother my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: traveling shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get a chair for my daughter's desk. This one was exactly like the picture. She loves the color and it's durable. However, it's a little smaller than I expected. Nonetheless, it works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Honey131

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for Short Adults
customer_reviews.text: Aggressive post-purchase customer service. I'm 5'2'' 125 lbs. It's hard to find furniture that suits my ideal ergonomic position. The seat isn't large enough to put a lumbar cushion and it's not high enough to lean back too far. Also, high seat positions require semi-frequent readjustment but I like the bright color & it's a better solution for me ergonomically than the standard office chair alternatives. If you're looking at this chair for children I'm sure it'd be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E. Mouse

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again because of the swivel
customer_reviews.text: The swivel is not good for kids. It can’t be locked and my son keep spinning on it instead of sitting still and focus.
customer_reviews.author: curious A

customer_reviews.title: perfect kids chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted for kids chairs. I had a pair of little desks and was looking for slim little rolling chairs for preschool & elementary school kids. These have held up well to their abuse and feel sturdier than the adult chairs we have. They're pretty comfy too. I sit in one to help with homework.
customer_reviews.author: Urszula Tanouye

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair!it's soft cushion and spins so my kids have fun on it me too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly colorful chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. The color is exactly like the picture. So easy to assemble my 11 yr old can put it together herself. Its definitely kids or junior size chair so i wouldn't recommend for an adult. The seat lifts up or down and weel glides smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Buying again for another child!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter and it is fantastic. Had it for over 6 months has held up good even with the sit and spin game she plays with it. Adjusts nicely to fit comfortably under her desk and even uses it to sit in to play video games. Held up very nicely so far. The color is perfect too! I bought my son one for his desk and now my youngest wants one for hers too! Reordering again in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wilhelme

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair as a Christmas gift for our 7 year old granddaughter. It was very easy to assemble, and is definitely worth the price as it is very well constructed. The color is true to the picture, and the hydraulic feature works very well. This is also a chair that while it is a perfect fit for our 7 year old, she can also grow into it for future years.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy inexpensive chair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4th grader to go with a desk for her room. Her favorite color and works as needed. She’s too light to have it adjust down so as kids do when she pulls the lever, I have to readjust, but fun for her as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The overall chair itself is just as pictured. I had some issues with putting it together (i.e. Some of the screws did not line up correctly), but was able to screw it in far enough to secure the backrest negating any safety issues. Andy at Green World customer service was very helpful and accommodating regarding this issue. Excellent customer service here.
customer_reviews.author: hlo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter's room!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to go with a wooden desk I painted the same color. It has wheels so I got a clear plastic mat to put on the carpeted floor so she could roll around on it. It's holding up well. Still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gilley

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect size and I can also sit on it as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 10th birthday. She loves it! It is the perfect size and I can also sit on it as well. Easy to assemble, rolls well, and doesn't make noise when you swivel. Love that the height adjusts. The back is very flexible which is fun for kids and makes for comfortable seating. However, if you like to sit straight when you lean back that will not happen. Thinking about purchasing a few for flexible seating in my class.
customer_reviews.author: OliveOil

customer_reviews.title: Good Child Desk Chair
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 6 year old girl and the availability of "colors" is a critical dimension. No issue with assembly and build appears to be sturdy. Back has good support versus a singular connection. Seat is comfortable for the child and should support good posture. The 5 point base should prevent tip over.
customer_reviews.author: chw

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for use with her Sauder desk. Great chair and perfect for her. Assembly time about 15 minutes - comes with 8 screws 8 washers and the allen wrench to tighten the screws. the wheels pop in the legs with a little pressure - unlike the picture the wheels on our chair were purple and matched the back which was a nice surprise. Also her desk is higher then standard and this chair adjusted to the needed height no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and 110lbs and this chair fits. The seat is not so deep that I have to sit forward, so I get to use the back instead of hunching over my sewing machine and getting an instant backache. I think I'll be happy with this. My only complaint is that the top edge digs a little, but I have a few ideas about solving that.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I have a thin teenager but even she says the chair seems small. These chairs would be adorable, and better suited for grammar school kids around 8-10. I’m giving them so some friends with daughters. They are sturdy! The back of the chair is just too flexible for a teenager. My daughter wanted something she had a little more room in. Like I said, she is thin, so that’s saying something. They are not that difficult to assemble. Picture is on the box, so be careful if bought as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ren625

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Desk Chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for our daughter's desk! She wanted a teal chair, and this was a fun and reasonable cost chair. If your looking for back support, then you will want to look into another option though.
customer_reviews.author: Tiah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good chair. Potentially dangerous to smaller children.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5yo son. He was very happy to get his own office chair and regularly sits and spins back and forth in it. He insists on putting it on the highest setting so he can be "taller", though a lower setting is much easier for him to sit comfortably at. My only complaint is that it spins so easily that my 2yo fell and knocked his head against a desk when trying to climb aboard. He does not have this issue with the heavier office chairs my husband and I use. I'm not sure this is an outright flaw, but it was an unexpected safety issue for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Mom #11

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the quality of these chairs. We have one in teal and one in purple. They work great and are comfortable for my kiddos to sit in. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: This chair is not made for an adult.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fairly easy to assemble. Directions for assembly is located on one page and only exhibit photos. I feel there should be some bolts to better hold the middle pole section. It just sits in the hole located at the bottom half of the chair. The wheels were a little difficult to snap into place. Also, if you are using this for a child or pre-teen, please note that their weight might not be enough to lower the height of the chair. The curve of the back rest does offer support. The color of the chair is true to its origin. It is a cute chair for a child or pre-teen.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Two of the holes on the chair back were filled with plastic. I had to drill the holes out to be able to bolt it to the seat. Other than that, the chair was easy to assemble. Seat purchased for a 6 year old. She loves it. I’m still giving the product 5 stars because I believe the obstructed bolts holes are just a slight mistake at the manufacturing level and not the norm for what buyers receive.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great desk chair!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old loves this chair. It's perfect for virtual school! It was easy to assemble and is sturdy. She is 55 inches tall and weighs 68 pounds. She can change the height by herself but needs a little help lowering it. I originally wished the wheels would've locked but we have found that it's not an issue. Great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: The chair is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not comfortable. Not much padding works ok with a cushion added.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my 9 year old daughter to use at her desk in her bedroom. The chair is the perfect size and my daughter loves it (especially the "swivel" as she calls it). I was a little concerned about the color matching the picture, but it was exactly what we had hoped for. Putting the chair together was very simple and took less than 15 minutes. I would definitely buy again and strongly recommend this chair if you are in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Aggiebeach

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This came in a very small package and I was mentally prepared for a multi-hour adventure including YouTube videos...to my surprise my 7 year old was largely able to assemble this herself in under 30 minutes (with a little help from mom & dad). I bet if an adult did it solo, it would take less than 10 minutes. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi W

customer_reviews.title: Its way over priced & not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Even though this chair looks cute ITS MOST DEFINITELY NOT WORTH ITS COST!! They chair is cheaply made, super small, and uncomfortable. I bought it for my 8 yr old daughter thinking it would be a nice chair considering the cost. I paid over $70 for it. I was under the impression I'd be getting a solid chair. It was not what I expected. Its WAY OVER PRICED! I have requested a refund. Like I said its a cute looking chair in pictures but in real life it's not worth what I paid. This chair should be no more that $25-30 bucks, if that. Not sturdy, and my daughter was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chair, Questionable Stability
customer_reviews.text: Very cute chair! Not hard to assemble but you definitely need elbow grease for the screws and to affix the roller wheels. Body of chair easily comes off the frame so keep this in mind if you’ve got kiddos who like to surf on chairs. Otherwise, a perfect visual addition and the right size for a child’s desk. It would be too small for an adult unless they were petite.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kamia

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair and beautiful color! I was able to assemble it in under fifteen minutes and get it working for my daughter. Only downside was that at 70 pounds, she’s still not heavy enough to make it sink down on its own when you pull the lever so that’s a little tough but other than that, happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great for elementary and pre-teens
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. It’s perfect for my 9 year old getting ready to start a new year in distance learning. The frame feels very sturdy and well made. Nice, vibrant color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree G.

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to open when you receive it to check for deformities
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for my twins one blue one pink. They opened them as gifts for their bday to go along with their desks for their rooms. Pink one was easy to assemble. Blue we can not get the nails in attach the back of the chair to the bottom because of some deformity. Can’t even return it since it is past the return date and we ordered it early. Have a defective chair for $50 awesome not awesome
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not super comfy
customer_reviews.text: The chair is cute and the quality is fine, but it's not terribly comfortable - especially if you'll be sitting on it for a while like our kids do at their art desk. It would be fine for a small child, but definitely not a teenager. Our 7 year old is already complaining that she wants a cushier chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sparklene

customer_reviews.title: great color and perfect for child's room
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my 7 year old's desk. i think the quality is above average however, the first one we ordered broke immediately so the lift function didn't work. I sent back and received a full refund and have had no issues with the second one i purchased. The color is adorable and perfect for a childs room.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk chair for the kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: So far this chair has been perfect. The ease of height adjustment and the color makes it pop!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very attractive and and seems to be of good quality. I'm 5'4" and and the height is fine. I think the chair seat would be a perfect size for a child or slender teen. It's a little on the small side for me, however, I still like it. I especially wanted an aqua colored chair.
customer_reviews.author: BKB

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair to go with a small desk for my 5 year old daughter. It is a little on the big side for her, but she is still able to use it fine and she will grow into it. She loves it!! Cute little chair for the price!! Easy to assemble. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are perfect for my kids
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for my kids. I am using it for a 4 year old. It is a little big but works perfectly for him. Comfortable and adorable. The only downside is that the fabric stains easily. I have spots all over it from water. I have never seen water put stains all over fabric and never dry. It looks like oil spots but I saw the water spill twice and messed up the fabric. Overall, I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Holes for screws don't align
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 chairs, very cute, perfect size for kids. Would had been very easy to put together if not for misaligned holes on both chairs. After struggling for a while we were able to put a screw in on one of the chairs. For the other one we had to drill through the metal to enlarge the opening.
customer_reviews.author: luda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting 3 of these chairs and paired them with the Flash furniture student desk for my children who's doing virtual school at home now. Assembly was super easy and put together in 15mins. All you need is a hammer for the wheels. My children loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: the height adjustment is not smooth at all, works with a jerk
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this chair to anyone. I bought this for my 7 yr old, the height adjustment does not work properly. With her weight it does not go down. When it does its with a jerk, not smooth at all. The back rest is cheap flimsy plastic. Not worth the $60 at all. You can get a much better quality chair from iKEA for much less. I am going to keep the item because disassembling and packaging is again work for me. But not happy with the quality, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: apneet

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily, but not the same quality as the Homycasa ...
customer_reviews.text: Colour is as shown, maybe the seat is slightly more green than teal. Went together easily, but not the same quality as the Homycasa Rolling Armless Task Chair. The footprint is narrower so I'm a little worried about it tipping and the back is quite flimsy and not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One easily fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my kids. One is still holding up well, the other has come apart and none of the local hardware stores sell the right screws to reattach the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Curley

customer_reviews.title: It's not for an adult sized person. It's smaller
customer_reviews.text: This chair is basically for a child or a really small person. The back part reaches to half my back. It's fine because it's for my son but when I sat on it and try to reach forward I sort of flipped. It doesn't flip backwards easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Look
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to put together and is light. The chair raises up and collapses down easily. The feet are compact and so it doesn’t take up too much floor space. I also like the chair back design. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Arn

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND BUYING IT!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing! It is such a pretty color, and the chair itself is very comfortable and very good quality for the price. I bought this for my 11 year old's daughters room, and it fit her desk perfectly. I wouldn't recommend this chair for teen's because this chair is on the smaller side. The assembly was so quick and easy. My daughter could assemble it in 10 minutes without any help. I love that you don't need any tools of your own, not even a screwdriver! It comes with a makeshift screwdriver that works exactly like a real one. Again, I highly recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Karuna

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to put together and seems sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfext size for kids and teens...it can hold the weight of an adult, but i wouldnt lean back on the back support part of it. Very simple to put together and seems sturdy so far. Awwsome color and daughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester The Photographer Potter

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really likes the chair. Adjustable and she says it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair! He’s 3 and it’s a great size for him to use now and to grow into!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great desk chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair for my daughter’s room. It out together easily and is very sturdy, even on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jini Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Broken/damaged right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair as it was the perfect color for my daughters newly redone room. When it arrived, the handle to raise and lower the chair was snapped off, and the seat was stained (possibly a return from a previous customer?). Also, although the base/wheels and seat seem to be of good quality, the back is flimsy and wouldn’t take much to break. It’s being returned because it’s broken, but also poor quality for price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She is 9–works perfectly with her ikea desk!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my cute new chair. It rolls smoothly, swivels easily. The seat is not extremely cushioned so it may not be comfortable for long hours of sitting. Building some of the screws were a little challenging but everything came together.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Love the pink color!
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble took me about five ten minutes to do it. It’s also a descent height for a 9 year old kid. My daughter loves it so that’s a plus. The pink is a really pretty pink color as well. Over all it’s a pretty nice chair.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Seat back broke after 4 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: This chair back snapped in several locations after just 4 months of light use by my 10 year old. The seller sent us a replacement chair, but the new chair also has issues. The screw holes in the bottom that hold the seat back to the chair were not drilled properly, making it impossible to get the new chair assembled. I took the broken seat back off the old chair and replaced it with the new seat back, so I have one complete chair, and one that's going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good chair but very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The chairs is goof but when the fabric got dirty it was impossible to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Rugiada

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 y old son loves it in his room. It is nice, sturdy and i love the color. It is very nice office chair for kids
customer_reviews.author: Ivona GS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a pink chair on wheels for her online learning. We decided on this chair and I'm glad we did. It was easy to assemble, didnt require any tools and is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Parkhill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Child’s Chair.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little chair for any child’s work area. I bought this for my granddaughter in home school desk and she loves it. It raises up and down so she can see the computer and camera.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Please check your delivery for chair.
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the chair is very nice and for the price it shouldn't have any faults. But when my daugther recieved the box the top of chair was pink and the bottom cushion was green. The packaging for the chair was dusty. I would have returned the chair but it was a gift for my granddaughter in which they were moving and I didn't check the box with the chair. Also, the window is close to return it. Please check the boxes when they are deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great chair + seller, perfect transaction!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome chair at an amazing price; I highly recommend this product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this chair.
customer_reviews.text: Meant for kids but will support a smaller adult. Kids love spinning and rolling the chair around. It raises easily. Smaller child doesn't weigh enough to lower the seat. Easy to assemble. Love the green color.
customer_reviews.author: SonicDeathMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. I sat in it and it’s super comfy. Great arch support for the lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyofthree

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Perfect size for my pre-teen. I’m not sure how great it would be for a full grown teen, especially if they are over 150 lbs. Also, the shades are a bit different on the fabric vs the plastic back, but it isn’t horrible. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer locke

customer_reviews.title: Bought this chain on 11jan2018, 15feb2018 this chair will ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chain on 11jan2018, 15feb2018 this chair will not rise up anymore and.....my window to return to amazon has closed! Wow!!!!! Probably should have gotten this thing from a competitor with a longer return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel J Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: As described. Very pleased with ease of putting together. Got it for my daughter's use for virtual school this year. She loves the chair and color and seems to be fairly well made. It is on the small side so couldn't really see a full grown adult male using daily but that's not what it was advertised as. good solid chair for young adult, teenager or small adult for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bluv

customer_reviews.title: Great for growing kids
customer_reviews.text: My six year olds are growing quickly, so I wanted to get an adjustable chair. Very easy to assemble, adjust, operate and it looks great. I have even sat on it, so it is sturdy enough for an adult. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: J. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Aqua chair
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good chair for a child and that is what I am using it for but would never use for adult. The back is made out of plastic. I would not lean back on it if you are an adult.
customer_reviews.author: kgood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, wheels roll well without sticking. No arms on the chair just as I intended. Used for a vanity in a girl's room. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Allenfarm

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, comfortable and cute. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice but be careful when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great chair. Unfortunately the screws strip out really easily so be very careful when putting them in. Thankfully they are a common size so the stripped ones can be replaced easily
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Not made for lightweight kids.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chair. My complaint is I got it for my 11 year old daughter, who only weighs 55#. She cannot make the chair go down by herself as she is too light. The wheels also don't roll very easily so it is a little hard for her to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love the color. Prefect fit for a teens room. Chair is comfortable and easy to assemble. Will be adding pictures as soon as the rest of my granddaughter's bedroom set comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Seainna

customer_reviews.title: works for a short adult
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for the price. It was not difficult to assemble, although the instructions could use a bit more clarification. I am petite (5'1") and this chair works great for me. My only complaint is that the level of the chair does not adjust easily, I have to use some force to adjust it down.
customer_reviews.author: Tea eater

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality chair for my daughter's computer desk.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality chair for my daughter's computer desk. She loves the color. Can't speak to the quality of the wheels as we replaced the hard plastic wheels with higher quality rubber in-line rollerskate style wheels since we have hardwood floors, and the pairing has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 4'11" and this chair is perfect for petite sizes. It's easy to assemble too. And comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Hardware and instructions missing.
customer_reviews.text: No hardware to assemble,no instructions. stain on seat. On my way to hardware store to get bolts,then clean seat and figure out how to assemble.will never purchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Compact & stylish chair!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Tucks under the desk easily. It is a small chair but it works for the space needed. Love the color & style of the chair. It is for my 12 year old & she is 4’10”. Only time will tell the sturdiness & support it provides. But overall pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, bright colored chair
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old really likes this chair. I will say, she has flipped over a little easy in it. We do have hardwoods in her room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Other than that a great child desk chair and it’s purple which she loves
customer_reviews.text: For sure hard to put together the screws don’t line up correctly and we really had to wrestle with it. This is definately a child’s size desk chair in every way except the weight needed to lower the seat. My 60 pound 11 year old daughter is not heavy enough to lower it. Other than that a great child desk chair and it’s purple which she loves :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality and even better price! The color was as pictured and the chair was so easy to put together. I looked for a long time to find a chaor for my daughters room that was colorful and not overly expensive. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved her new desk chair for virtual kindergarten. Assembling the wheels was a pain. Otherwise great chair
customer_reviews.author: Tultul

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: The carousels do not stay with the legs. There is no way you can attach them to the legs. They can be only loosely put at the legs and so do not stay there. After over an hour effort I gave up. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: If you want a pink desk chair ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a pink desk snake and this fit the bill nicely. Relatively sturdy and adjustable. The back is a little flimsy, but everything else is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Noel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great kid chair for kids
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small chair for 10 yrs old from local shops for quite long time. No luck. Finally found this and am happy with size, and quality. Fits very well for young kid.
customer_reviews.author: Esper

product_meta.title: GreenForest Office Task Desk Chair Adjustable Mid Back Home Children Study Chair, Turquoise
feature_bullets: Teens office chair with great pop turquoise color, this cute bright color match easily with room decoration and stationery, which can bring good mood for children.
Kids desk chair is very easy to assemble, only need to screw 8 bolts, kid can install it in 10 minutes, a great gift for children, leave an interesting manual time to them.
Desk chair is height adjustable and 360 degrees swivel, very easy to handle, suitable for different ages kids.
Mid Back computer chair with fish bone design back and soft seat, cute and breathable, very comfortable to seat on it.
Desk chair is also suitable for petite adult, the seat size is 15.2x15.7 inch, height is 29.5-34.2 inch. Max holding weight can be 200 pounds.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars853 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
